rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Namibia halted imports of live poultry from 10 countries on Friday following outbreaks of bird flu in Europe.

rationale: The segment describes actions neutrally, without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
